EmailTemplate.name: Apache Geode Webinar 9-8-15.Apache Geode Webinar 9-8-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Building Effective Apache Geode Applications with Spring Data GemFire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Building Effective Apache Geode Applications with Spring Data GemFire This talk will provide an overview of Spring Data GemFire and how SDG's features can be used to simplify the development of distributed, scalable applications leveraging Apache Geode's capabilities.
Featured Presenter: John Blum - Staff Engineer, Spring Team, Pivotal Software, Inc.
No registration is required. Simply join the session here <https://meet57398766.adobeconnect.com/clubhouse/>. North America Tuesday, September 8, 2015 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Connecting <http://connect.pivotal.io/ApacheGeodeWebinarProgram_Register.html>
